mapper.select:
select count(*) cnt from PRODUCT
and c2.NAME like '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'
and p.ID like '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'

select ID, NICKNAME , PCODE,NAME as category, PNAME,PRICE,INPUT_DATE from(select p.ID,m.NICKNAME,p.PCODE, c2.NAME, p.PNAME, p.PRICE, p.INPUT_DATE ,row_number() over(order by p.INPUT_DATE desc) rnum from PRODUCT p, MEMBER m,CATEGORY2 c2,CATEGORY3 c3 where m.id=p.id and p.C3CODE = c3.C3CODE and c2.C2CODE=c3.C2CODE and PCANCEL !='D' and SALEOK !='Y'
and c2.NAME like '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'
and p.ID like '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'
) where rnum between 1 and 10

select p.PNAME,p.PCODE, p.PCANCEL, m.ID, m.NICKNAME, p.IMG, c1.name as category, c2.NAME as category2,c3.name as category3, p.PRICE, p.STATUS,p.INPUT_DATE from PRODUCT p, MEMBER m,CATEGORY c1,CATEGORY2 c2,CATEGORY3 c3 where m.id=p.id and p.C3CODE = c3.C3CODE and c1.CCODE =c2.CCODE and c2.C2CODE=c3.C2CODE and p.pcode=#{ pcode }
